New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 68 off 40 balls, the highest individual score in the match
Key Match Events: Lungi Ngidi took 4 wickets for 14 runs
David Miller finished unbeaten on 59 off 46 to see South Africa over the line
Pre-Game Insights: India expected the pitch to have something in it with the weather around
South Africa's bowling line-up was in good form, barring Temba Bavuma
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma said India were not good enough on the field and missed a few run-outs
Temba Bavuma said they backed themselves and kept improving
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was such that the wicket could come any time for the seamers
India had to beat Bangladesh by a fairly big margin in their last match to keep their net run rate above the rest of the chasing pack
